plot: In a windowless, doorless room, a man organically creates lights. Forced to do so by an anonymous voice, he is pushed to his limits. In a rage, he accidentally finds escape and enters into a world he never could have imagined.
title: I, Helios
plot_es: In a windowless, doorless room, a man organically creates lights. Forced to do so by an anonymous voice, he is pushed to his limits. In a rage, he accidentally finds escape and enters into a world he never could have imagined.
plot_en: In a windowless, doorless room, a man organically creates lights. Forced to do so by an anonymous voice, he is pushed to his limits. In a rage, he accidentally finds escape and enters into a world he never could have imagined.
